text: Ştefan Apostol (born 17 October 1974) is a Romanian former football player, who played most of his career for FCM Bacău. ==External links== * * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Liga I players Category:FCM Bacău players Category:FC Rapid București players Category:FC Vaslui players Category:FC Botoșani players Category:CS Aerostar Bacău players Category:Cypriot First Division players Category:Digenis Akritas Morphou FC players Category:Romanian expatriate footballers Category:Romanian expatriate sportspeople in Cyprus Category:Expatriate footballers in Cyprus Category:Romanian football managers Category:FC Botoșani managers
title: Ștefan Apostol
